description:
Meet Whish Money, the leading e-wallet in Lebanon connecting mobile operators, app and gaming stores, utility services, financial services, billers and service providers with retailers and end users.

•     Top-up your account
•     Use your free digital Visa card
•     Scan to Pay on over 10,000 POS in Lebanon
•     Get a travel eSIM within seconds
•     Pay online by Whish on participant websites
•     Transfer money locally and internationally to over 500,000 locations
•     Get paid by card or through Whish
•     Purchase telecom vouchers and gift cards
•     Transfer airtime credit & telecom services to anyone
•     Pay Billers, Utilities, and Taxes
•     Shop the latest mobile devices and accessories
•     Keep track of your transactions & purchases
•     Disburse Payroll

Service Providers on Whish include:
-     Money Transfer: Mastercard, Ria, Taptap Send, Sendwave, Uremit, Shift, GCC Remit
-     Mobile Operators:  Alfa, Touch, Ogero, DU, Etisalat
-     Online Services: iTunes, Anghami, Skype, eBay, Facebook, Netflix, Shahid, beIN
-     Gaming Stores: Blizzard, Apex, Pubg, Fortnite, Steam, PSN, Nintendo, XBOX, Karma Koin, Razer, Runescape, League of Legends (LOL), World of Warcraft (WOW), NCoin, La3eeb, Eve Online Plex, Nexon, IMVU, Roblox, mCOINZ, Crossfire
-     Internet Providers: Cyberia, Terranet, Wise, IDM, Mobi, Sodetel, Connect

إيفو: مِحفظَتك الإلكترونيَّة المُطلقة

إيفو، رفيقك الرقمي الكامل للتمويل، الذي سيحدث ثورة في كيفيّة إدارة أموالك. 
مع التركيز على البساطة والأمان، يقدم تطبيقنا مجموعة من الميّزات المُصمّمة خصيصاً لتلبية إحتياجاتك الماليّة !

الميّزات الرئيسية:
عمليّة إعداد سهلة وسريعة: قم بإنشاء مِحفظَتك في دقائق من خلال عمليّة سريعة وخالية من المتاعب
سرعة الإمتثال: ستكون مِحفظَتك معتمدة وجاهزة للإستخدام في غضون 24 ساعة
خيارات تمويل متنوّعة: قم بتعبئة مِحفظَتك من خلال فروع إيفو، شبكة شركائنا الواسعة والبطاقات المصرفية
إرسال الأموال من داخل لبنان: إستفد مجاناً من تحويل الأموال محلياً بسهولة تامة
سهولة الدفع: قم بالشراء من أي متجر من خلال مسح رمز الإستجابة السريعة بطريقة بسيطة
تحويلات إيفو الفورية من محفظة إلى محفظة: حوّل الأموال من وإلى إيفو بكبسة واحدة، وذلك بدون أي رسوم
نظام الولاء: إجمع النقاط مع كل معاملة وإستردّها في محفظتك أو إستبدلها بقسائم في مواقع مختلفة
مراجعة الإنفاق: تتبع نفقاتك حسب الفئة، محافظًا بذلك على مراقبة كاملة على أموالك
أرصدتك بين يديك: تحقق بسهولة من رصيد مِحفظَتك وكشوف حسابك عند الحاجة

نظّم أُمورك الماليّة مع مِحفظَة EVO. قم بتنزيل التطبيق الآن لتجربة ميّزات إيفو الفريدة وتولّي مسؤوليّة رحلتك الماليّة.
قل مرحباً لطريقة أكثر ذكاءً للدفع !

Introducing OMT Pay: Your Ultimate Mobile Wallet

OMT Pay is not just another mobile wallet app - it's your all-in-one solution for seamless financial transactions. Download now and experience financial freedom like never before!

Key Features:

- Quick and Easy Setup: Create your wallet in minutes with a light KYC process. It's fast and hassle-free!
- Rapid Compliance: Get cleared within 24 hours, and your wallet is ready for action.
- Multiple Funding Options: Add funds to your wallet through 7 different methods, in both LBP and USD.
- Send Money Anywhere: Send and receive money locally for free or make international transfers through Western Union.
- Effortless Payments: Pay at any store with a simple QR code scan.
- OMT Visa Card: Apply for your OMT Visa Card with just a few clicks and collect it at your nearest OMT Shop. You can also make any payment or transfer using the balance of your OMT Visa Card.
- Private and Public Sector Payments: Settle your payments with a few simple clicks.
- Recharge with Ease: Access over 1,000 recharge and top up cards, including local telecom, internet, gaming, shopping, streaming and online cards.
- Instant Transfers: Send money to your OMT wallet contacts with a single click, free of charge.
- Rewarding Transactions: Earn points with every transaction and redeem them in your wallet or for vouchers at various locations.
- Spending Insights: Keep track of your spending by category, giving you full control over your finances.
- Balances at a Glance: Easily check the balance and statements for both your wallet and OMT Visa Card.
- Simplify your financial life with OMT Pay. Download now and enjoy a new level of convenience and control over your finances. Say hello to a smarter way to pay!

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

The BOB Finance mobile application provides you with a digital e-wallet, allowing end users to easily connect with service providers. Through only a few clicks, you can access mobile operators, utility services, financial services and APP and gaming stores. BoB Finance is a FinTech company and an accredited Western Union agent in Lebanon.

• Instant local and international money transfer
• Top-up your GSM mobile number
• Check the transfer fees for Local and International transfers using our built-in calculator.
• Stay informed about all available and new services provided by BOB Finance
• Create a profile for your payments and legal documents identification
• View all previous payments and transfers
• Locate nearby BOB Finance agents

List of service providers:
• Telecom Service Providers: alfa - Touch – Ogero

Welcome to neo, the new Digital Banking experience brought to you by Bank Audi. Our goal is to simplify your financial transactions like never before.

With neo, you can effortlessly handle your finances right from your fingertips. Plus, you'll have access to our extensive network of Bank Audi ATMs across Lebanon, and without the need for a physical card. This offers you security, and adds an extra layer of convenience to your banking experience.

Our dedicated neo Contact Center is at your service around the clock, even on weekends and holidays. We're ready to answer your questions and guide you through your neo App.

Key Features:
-	Open a neo Account with reduced Fees in minutes.
-	Receive International transfers to your neo Bank Account.
-	Receive your payroll payment to your neo Bank Account
-	Load your Fresh USD Account effortlessly using any other Bank card. 
-      Debit Card management.
-	Send, receive or request Money from other neo clients using their Mobile Numbers or their QR codes.
-	Withdraw & Deposit money on Bank Audi ATMs without a physical card.
-	Settle your Bills hassle-free.
-	Generate an official Statement of Account (QR validated) right from the App.
-	Update your Personal Information instantly.
-	Get support from neo Dedicated Contact Center available 24/7.
-	Receive Instant Notification upon every transaction made on your neo Accounts.
-	Locate Bank Audi ATMs.

Stay tuned for exciting updates and announcements, as we're working on adding new features and benefits!

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

TRADE ON THE GO WITH FXPRO!

Awarded ‘Best Mobile Trading App Global’ by the UFAwards. For more details, visit FxPro.com or contact us via LiveChat or at mobilehelp@fxpro.com.

DOWNLOAD NOW TO TRADE LIKE A PRO!

Trade responsibly: capital is at risk. FxPro, trading name of Pro Global Ltd, is based in Lyford Manor, Western Road, Lyford Cay, New Providence, N7776, The Bahamas.

Welcome to the amana app! Invest and trade 5,500+ assets with zero commission and no hidden fees. Start your investing and trading journey and join 320,000+ traders worldwide.



This revolutionary trading app, featured in media giants such as BBC, Reuters, Zawya, and Khaleej Times, is a one-stop brokerage where you can unlock access to:


• 2,100+ global stocks: Apple, Tesla, Amazon, Microsoft, Spotify, Nvidia, and more

• 200+ regional stocks: EMAAR, ADNOC, Salik, Aramco and more

• Forex: USD/EUR, USD/JPY, GBP/USD and more

• Oil: WTI crude and Brent crude oil

• Indices: S&P 500, DOW, NASDAQ, FTSE 100, DAX 30 and more

• Commodities: sugar, coffee, corn and more

• ETFs

• Physical assets (unleveraged)

• CFDs (leveraged)

• Fractional trading




FEATURES YOU’LL LOVE


Enjoy exceptional design and experience with personalized watchlists, news, notifications, and more.




PHYSICAL ASSETS


Unlike other brokers that offer only CFD trading, amana also allows you to invest in physical assets. Wouldn’t it be cool to have shares in Apple, Tesla, or EMAAR? Do you prefer physical assets, oil, or digital currencies? No problem at all. amana empowers you to be an investor and trader at the same time on its all-in-one app.




GLOBAL STOCKS


Get access to 2,100+ global stocks, from USA to Europe. You can invest in US or EU stocks, buy shares in global companies, which may bring you dividends*, or trade international stocks as CFDs. Your account, your choice.

*Remember to carefully review each company's dividend policy and eligibility criteria.




REGIONAL STOCKS


Power up your portfolio with the local brands you know and love. Choose from 200+ MENA stocks for your investment or trade them with leverage.




FRACTIONAL TRADING


What if you could invest in global and regional stocks without buying whole shares? Yes, fractional trading is available on the amana app. Choose from 1,000s of assets.





FOREX


Interested in taking part in the forex market with $5+ trillion in daily trading volume? We’ve got good news for you. Whether you want to trade major currency pairs such as EUR/USD, USD/JPY, GBP/USD or USD/CHF, or exotic currency pairs like USD/MXN, USD/RUB, USD/TRY or USD/HKD, we got your back. Trade 70+ currency pairs in a few taps.




OIL


Want to invest in oil or trade it with leverage? You can do both on amana! Unlock access to WTI crude and Brent crude oil.


INDICES


Imagine getting exposure to an entire economy or sector without buying individual stocks. Trade indices like S&P 500, DOW, NASDAQ, FTSE 100, DAX 30 and more.




FREE FINANCE EDUCATION


Even if you've never invested or traded before, world-famous Real Vision courses will teach you how to do that step by step. Learn from the world's best investors for free.




24/6 CUSTOMER SUPPORT


Our expert team is here to support you 24 hours a day, 6 days a week, in English and Arabic. Simply drop us a message at support@amana.app or chat with us via WhatsApp, Telegram, or Messenger, and we’ll be right with you.




DISCLOSURE


By default, all new accounts created on the amana app are opened with AFS Global Ltd and licensed and regulated by the Labuan Financial Services Authority, Labuan Malaysia

Trading might not be suitable for all investors. Before trading, investors should ensure they fully understand the risks involved in the financial products amana offers.

To read our full Risk Disclosure, go to https://amana.app/risk-disclosure.


CONTACT

Email: support@amana.app
Phone: +971 4 276 9525

Location:
Burj Khalifa Community, Mashreq Bank Global HQ 1301, Dubai, Downtown, United Arab Emirates
Phone: +971 4 434 0430

Licenses: 
https://amana.app/company/about 


Associated Fees: 
https://amana.app/markets/all-markets

Reinventing Banking. All in One App.
Suyool is your all-in-one digital wallet, Visa Platinum card, and financial hub made for modern life in Lebanon and beyond.
Open your account in minutes, manage LBP & USD balances, send or receive money, pay anywhere Visa is accepted, and earn rewards every time you spend.
Need more? Get an optional free bank account with IBAN for international transfers or apply for loans directly in-app when you need extra flexibility.
What you can do with Suyool:
* Open a wallet in minutes — no paperwork.
* Get a Visa Platinum card with free delivery.
* Access a free bank account with IBAN (optional).
* Apply for loans straight from the app.
* Send & receive money locally & internationally.
* Add or withdraw cash via pickup & delivery.
* Earn points and redeem for discounts.
* Manage Youth Wallets (11–17) with parental control.
* Travel smarter with lounge access, travel insurance & eSIM
* Freeze / unfreeze your card instantly.
Why users love it
* Freedom — wallet, card, IBAN, and loans in one app.
* Control — instant visibility & real-time actions.
* Rewards — spend smarter, earn more.
* Security — licensed & regulated by Banque du Liban.
Download Suyool today and experience simple, secure, & rewarding financial services, all in one app.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

Send Money Abroad – Fast, Safe & Affordable

Send money to your family and friends quickly and affordably with Taptap Send. Whether you’re supporting loved ones, covering school fees, or helping out in times of need, TapTap Send makes it easy to transfer money straight from your smartphone — no agent visits, no long waits.

With TapTap Send, you can transfer money across Africa, Asia, Latin America, and beyond in just a few taps. We offer low fees, excellent exchange rates, and multiple ways to receive money — including mobile wallets, bank transfers, and cash pickup. You can send money directly from your debit card or bank account (depending on your location)

Why use TapTap Send to send money?

- Fast money transfers – most transfers arrive in minutes

- Low-cost transfers – no hidden fees when you send money

- Great exchange rates – we negotiate daily to offer you more value when you transfer funds

- Convenient transfers – send from your phone, anytime, anywhere

- Multiple payout options – transfer money to mobile wallets, bank accounts, or for cash pickup

You can send money to over 50 countries, including:

Pakistan

India

Nigeria

Ghana

Brazil

Mexico


…and many more. Explore the full list at taptapsend.com.

Send money from:

United Kingdom

United States

European Union

Canada

United Arab Emirates

Australia

We work with leading banks and financial partners to ensure your money reaches where it’s needed. Transfer money to:

Mobile wallets: Orange Money, MTN, JazzCash, Easypaisa, bKash

Bank accounts: HBL, UBL, Access Bank, Fidelity Bank, and many more

Cash pickup: Available at trusted partner bank branches in select countries

TapTap Send puts safety first. Our platform is PCI-compliant, encrypted, and designed with multiple levels of security to protect your personal and financial information. We never store your card details, and we never sell your personal data.

Our team comes from the communities we serve and speaks over 30 languages. We understand the challenges of sending money internationally and are here to make every money transfer easier, faster, and more affordable. If you ever need support, our friendly team is just an email away at support@taptapsend.com.

Our Mission
We believe that diaspora communities deserve fast, secure, and fair ways to send money home. For too long, sending money internationally has been expensive and difficult. We’re changing that — by lowering costs, reducing delays, and improving your experience every time you transfer money.

Download TapTap Send and start sending money today.
Transfer money home — fast, safe, and stress-free.

*FX Gains apply
*Exchange rates for illustrative purposes only. Exchange rates are dynamic and are subject to fluctuation.

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place

Byblos Bank’s Mobile Banking application keeps you in control of your finances from anywhere, anytime, by turning your smartphone into a secure banking tool.   
  
Advantages

•Security: Bank with confidence, safe in the knowledge that all of your information is fully protected.  
•Efficiency: Check your account balances, manage your loans, and transfer funds between accounts, all with just a few clicks. 
•Convenience: Get your banking operations done free of charge, 24/7, anywhere you go, by using your smartphone.     
•Easy access: Best of all, Byblos Bank is the first bank in Lebanon to let its customers activate Mobile Banking without the hassle of visiting their branch. Just register and choose your own username and password; all you need is your Byblos Bank debit card.  

Features

Byblos Bank’s Mobile Banking application allows you to conduct a variety of daily banking transactions, including: 

•Manage  and view private and/or joint accounts
View all your account details, see up to two months of transaction history, and check the details of individual transactions.  

•Transfer funds between your private and/or joint accounts 
Perform real-time transfers; make same- or cross-currency transfers between LBP and USD. 

•View private and/or joint cards and settle additional credit card payments
Monitor your card spending and available balance, review credit and charge card transactions histories, check transaction details, and make additional credit card payments. You can also review your pending debit card transactions. 

•View private and/or joint loans and settle loan or bill payments
View your loan details, outstanding amounts and your next payment dates; track the number of your remaining payments, and settle your bills.

•Check your Akram Program Points/Miles
View your total Loyalty Point/Mile balance and track your points/miles per card 

•Locate Byblos Bank ATMs, Smart ATMs® and branches
Find your nearest Byblos Bank ATM and get all contact details for any Byblos Bank branch  

•Browse Byblos Bank products and current promotions
Apply for any Byblos Bank account, Bancassurance plan, card, or retail loan products and view Byblos Bank’s latest offerings or news

•Order checkbooks and submit various service requests
Contact Byblos Bank Customer Service by phone or email, or submit a request to stop lost cards, or to obtain specific or general information on the Bank’s products.

•Transfer funds between your private and/or joints accounts and to other Byblos Bank customers by adding beneficiary account number to your pre-defined transfer list.

Activation:
•Click on My Bank and choose to register 
•Enter your primary debit card number, PIN code, and mobile number
•Enter the activation code sent to you by SMS
•Choose your username and password
•Choose your secret questions and answers
•Enjoy Byblos Bank Mobile Banking!

Note: 
•Only retail clients holding a Byblos Bank debit card can activate the Mobile Banking application through their smartphones. If you require assistance, please call Byblos Bank Customer Service at +961 1 205050
